extension-point.name: elasticSearchConfig
extension-point.documentation:
Extension point used to contribute the configuration for Elasticsearch engine.
There are 3 ways of integrating Nuxeo and Elasticsearch :
Embedded In this mode, Elasticsearch is deployed inside the same JVM as Nuxeo.
nuxeoTestNode nuxeoTestCluster
External : Autostart In this mode, Elasticsearch is supposed to be installed outside of Nuxeo, the Nuxe Server will simply start a new Node.
/home/tiry/devs/elasticsearch-0.90.2/bin/elasticsearch nuxeoTestNode nuxeoTestCluster
External : Join In this mode, Elasticsearch is supposed to be installed outside of Nuxeo, the Nuxe Server will simply connect to an already running node.
127.0.0.1 8001
